channel.title: Bon Iver on Paul Cutler
channel.description: Recent content in Bon Iver on Paul Cutler

item.title: August Vinyl
item.description: Summer is the slow time for new music releases and August saw a number of great new releases, with even more coming later this fall. Here’s some of the new releases I picked up on vinyl in August: Superchunk – I Hate Music: The alt rockers have been around since 1989(!) and I Hate Music is their tenth album. The album is short and sweet, clocking in at just over 37 minutes.

item.title: Round-Up
item.description: Some links to get you through your day: Florence + The Machine’s second album should be complete by the end of July and offer a “heavier sound”. (Florence + The Machine play the Minnesota Zoo a week from tomorrow. Pitchfork reviews Arctic Monkey’s new album Suck it and See, giving it a 7.5. One of the most buzzed about releases of the year, Bon Iver’s self-titled album Bon Iver, is now streaming and comes out June 21st.
